name: Conquer
description: Conquer is a marketplace that empowers game organizers to earn money hosting sports events through our app, which handles scheduling, payment processing, leaderboards, and connects with their existing network, venues, and players.
one_liner: Conquer is a marketplace that empowers game organizers to earn money hosting sports events through our app, which handles scheduling, payment processing, leaderboards, and connects with their existing network, venues, and players.
